name: Crystal Resonator
description: A delicate crystal shard attuned to the celestial harmonics that resonate through the shattered spires. When held, it allows you to sense subtle changes in the fabric of reality and track hidden patterns within the spires' labyrinthine structure.

name: Stellar Cartographer's Journal
description: A worn leather journal filled with cryptic notes and celestial maps that seem to point towards a deeper understanding of the shattered spires' power. The cartographer's writings hint at an imminent alignment of celestial bodies that will unlock previously unknown secrets within this labyrinthine complex.
